column2: Not only talk about the case, but also about the future of the oil industry
column3: Good analysis on horizontal and vertical boundaries
column6: increasing market power in both upstream and downstream market
column8: very detailed analysis on BP's profitability

column9: A very good essay. Besides all the good points and further improvements, maybe you can think more about how to isolate the impact of merger activity from the price effect?

In general, a good essay. Besides all the good points and further improvements, I particular appreciate the conclusion part, in which you hold a cautious and rational attitude towards the value of synergies by admitting the limitation of this study.
